name: Harmeny's Adventure
description:
A short game (maybe 4 hours) about a little girl named Harmeny and the adventures she is thrown into. My first complete Rpg Maker game. Let me know what you think and what I can do better next time. 

Some highlights: 

Save at any time except during conversation and battles.

Light hearted characters.

Some comedy.

Solve a mystery quest.

Some animated enemies.

Light puzzles.

Battle system with a few attacks that need a specific state to unleash.

List of known glitches:

Unable to save near the start of the game. Leaving Harmeny's house solves this problem.

Uncommon random crashes during battles. This one is a total mystery to me. It doesn't happen often though.

Let me know if you find any other issues. I will try to patch them up.

Hope everyone has a fun time playing.
